channel.title: Use an android hotspot to execute commands
channel.description:
Helloo,
I want to know if it's possible to play a sound from Phone X into Phone Y without programs that is connected to a hotspot from Phone X. The way it has to be done, i will figure it out later, Just asking if it is possible.
Help appreciated.
Note: By "no programs" , i meant no programs on the "victim" phone.

item.title: Use an android hotspot to execute commands
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

i see… Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Use an android hotspot to execute commands

item.title: Use an android hotspot to execute commands
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Um, right, so you have X and your victim has Y.

Phone Y connects to the hotspot. Phone X is a rooted android phone and it uses a javascript vulnerability to remote execute apps on the victim phone. Since you are providing the hotspot you can redirect all outgoing network requests, which is a great attack vector.

Possible? Yes.

Read full topic
item.source: Use an android hotspot to execute commands
